infoPlist.NSDocumentsFolderUsageDescription: This app needs access to documents for importing training data.
infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: This app requires access to your health and fitness data to track your workouts and provide insights.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: This app requires permission to update your health and fitness data for accurate workout tracking and analysis.
infoPlist.NSHealthClinicalHealthRecordsShareUsageD: This app requires access to your clinical health records to provide comprehensive health insights.
